scripts.compile:release: bun run compile:prepare && bun run compile:linux-x64 && bun run compile:linux-arm64 && bun run compile:windows-x64 && bun run compile:macos-arm64 && bun run compile:macos-x64
scripts.compile:linux-x64: bun build --compile --minify --sourcemap --define process.platform='"linux"' --define process.arch='"x64"' src/index.ts --outfile bin/jot-linux-x64 --target=bun-linux-x64
scripts.compile:linux-arm64: bun build --compile --minify --sourcemap --define process.platform='"linux"' --define process.arch='"arm64"' src/index.ts --outfile bin/jot-linux-arm64 --target=bun-linux-arm64
scripts.compile:windows-x64: bun build --compile --minify --sourcemap --define process.platform='"win32"' --define process.arch='"x64"' src/index.ts --outfile bin/jot-windows-x64.exe --target=bun-windows-x64
scripts.compile:macos-arm64: bun build --compile --minify --sourcemap --define process.platform='"darwin"' --define process.arch='"arm64"' src/index.ts --outfile bin/jot-macos-arm64 --target=bun-darwin-arm64
scripts.compile:macos-x64: bun build --compile --minify --sourcemap --define process.platform='"darwin"' --define process.arch='"x64"' src/index.ts --outfile bin/jot-macos-x64 --target=bun-darwin-x64
